Package RobotProjectGUI

Class ArenaItem

java.lang.Object
RobotProjectGUI.ArenaItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Obstacle, Robot
public abstract class ArenaItem extends Object
Author:
dijan Abstract class used to represent an item in the arena.

      Checks to see if the game object's new position is in the arena
      Parameters:
      newX - x value that ArenaItems wants to move to
      newY - y value that ArenaItems wants to move to

    • partyMode

      public char partyMode()
      Party mode, where objects will move faster and have a rainbow colour for a few seconds. They can either receive this effect from the Party Obstacle, or from an infected robot.
      Returns:
      What colour the item needs to be

    • compareSize

      public boolean compareSize(ArenaItem item2)
      Compares its size to other object. If the object is bigger, return true. If other object is bigger, return false.
      Parameters:
      item2 - Other object that it will be compared to in terms of size.
      Returns:
      True if the current item is bigger, false if the second item is bigger.
